20110112214710.000|20110112214713.000|TR0|
20110112214713.000|20110112214715.000|TR0|BLITZER:  -- given the history of that 
20110112214715.000|20110112214718.000|TR0|phrase.  It's a phrase that's been going 
20110112214718.000|20110112214720.000|TR0|around for a long time.  Normally, it 
20110112214720.000|20110112214723.000|TR0|refers to anti-Semites over the centuries 
20110112214723.000|20110112214725.000|TR0|accusing Jews of killing Christian 
20110112214725.000|20110112214728.000|TR0|children and using their blood for Jewish 
20110112214728.000|20110112214731.000|TR0|rituals like baking matzo during Passover, 
20110112214731.000|20110112214733.000|TR0|for example.
20110112214733.000|20110112214736.000|TR0|

20110112214738.000|20110112214741.000|TR0|why some Jewish groups like the 
20110112214741.000|20110112214743.000|TR0|Anti-Defamation League have criticized 
20110112214743.000|20110112214746.000|TR0|Sarah Palin today for using that specific
